item.title: My learning route through Launch X
item.description: So far here is what I’ve seen: Git GitHub Programming logic Python Jupyter notebooks Command Line HTML CSS JavaScript NodeJS Work (a little) with APIs Vue Angular Azure

item.title: The Culture of a Software Developer
item.description: In my opinion, a software profesional’s culture should be based upon: Team work Respect Trust Dedication Proactivity
